com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client.renderer
Interface HasChangeStyle<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The models' type rendered by the RhizosphereRenderer this interface is attached to.
public interface HasChangeStyle<T>

Interface for RhizosphereRenderer instances to declare that their renderings can handle custom style changes.

Author:
battlehorse@google.com (Riccardo Govoni)

Method Summary
 void changeStyle(T model, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget w, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> cssKeys, com.google.gwt.dom.client.Style style, boolean isReverting)
          Changes the style of a rendering previously emitted by the RhizosphereRenderer tagged with this interface.
 

Method Detail

changeStyle

void changeStyle(T model,
                 com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget w,
                 java.util.Set<java.lang.String> cssKeys,
                 com.google.gwt.dom.client.Style style,
                 boolean isReverting)
Changes the style of a rendering previously emitted by the RhizosphereRenderer tagged with this interface.

Parameters:
model - The Rhizosphere model the rendering represents.
w - The widget that was emitted by the renderer for this rendering. It will be a com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HTML instance if the renderer emitted a raw HTML string or DOM element.
cssKeys - The set of CSS attributes that the rendering should change.
style - A Style object containing the values to use for the keys defined in cssKeys.
isReverting - Whether this call is to revert the rendering to its original style (the one he had when he was emitted) or not.
